Title: Coda
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (series of graphic novels), Tony Moore (series of graphic novels), Charlie Adlard (series of graphic novels), Angela Kang
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Steven Yeun, Lauren Cohan
Plot: Rick and the group go face-to-face against Dawn and her officers in an attempt to save both Beth and Carol without any more bloodshed.
